Get Started

Table 1. 
Step    
1 Add Salt Masters

All minions are displayed automatically after

2 Create Targets

Targets are saved groups of managed systems. The following types of targets can be created:

  • Quick target
  • Shared targets
  • Private targets
3 Define Jobs  
4 View Job Status  
5 View Reports  
     
     
     
     
     

Install the first master
